SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_login_log (user_id, user_name, mobile_phone, platform,ip, create_time, modify_time ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update user_login_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip=#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, mobile_phone, platform,ip , create_time, modify_time from user_login_log
select id, user_id, user_name, mobile_phone, platform,ip , create_time, modify_time from user_login_log order by create_time desc limit 100
